review: Disappointed in the charges for movies and shows thru Prime that I can get on Netflix for free.Equipment is great and performs well.

review: Prices are just a bit high on everything so far. By the time I buy and pay to watch TV and shows I like I just as well pay cable.

review: everything i could have asked for and more

review: This thing is awesomely amazing and amazingly awesome!  I had my bluray player for almost 6 years and just had that thing playing my movies and Netflix.  But this fire stick does it all!! So glad I made the switch!

review: Works great. No more Roku for me
